name: Snake (itch) (bikramchaudhari)
description:
Install instructions

macOS Installation:

1. Download the zip file called 'snake_mac.zip'.

2. Once it is downloaded , open the file using Archive Utility. 

3. Once it has been opened you will see a file called 'snake'.

4 . Control+Click on the file and click open.

5. A window will appear asking if you want to open, and click open to play.

6. Have fun playing!
